quests.title: Connection Catalyst
quests.description: Reach out to a friend or family member you haven't spoken to recently. Relationships need tending like gardens.
objectives: Choose someone you haven't contacted recently
Reach out via call, text, or message
Have a genuine conversation about their life
tips: A simple 'thinking of you' message works wonders
Ask about their current interests or challenges

quests.title: Gratitude Messenger
quests.description: Write a heartfelt thank you message to someone who has helped you recently. Gratitude multiplies joy.
objectives: Think of someone who helped you recently
Write a specific, heartfelt thank you
Send it and make their day brighter
tips: Be specific about what they did and how it helped
Don't overthink it - sincerity matters most

quests.title: Community Guardian
quests.description: Offer help to a neighbor, colleague, or community member. Strengthening others strengthens the whole community.
objectives: Identify someone who could use assistance
Offer help with a specific task or need
tips: Start small - even 15 minutes of help matters
Ask 'How can I help?' instead of 'Let me know if you need anything'
Your unique skills are valuable to others

quests.title: Quality Time Weaver
quests.description: Spend uninterrupted quality time with someone important to you. Presence is the greatest gift.
objectives: Plan focused time together without distractions
tips: Put devices away or on silent
Ask open-ended questions about their thoughts and feelings

quests.title: Listening Sage
quests.description: Have a meaningful conversation where you focus entirely on listening and understanding. True wisdom begins with listening.
objectives: Choose a conversation where you focus on listening
Ask follow-up questions to understand deeper
Resist the urge to give advice unless asked
tips: Use phrases like 'Tell me more about that'
Reflect back what you hear: 'It sounds like...'
Sometimes people need to be heard, not fixed

quests.title: Celebration Herald
quests.description: Celebrate someone else's achievement or milestone, big or small. Joy shared is joy doubled.
objectives: Identify someone's recent achievement or milestone
Acknowledge it with enthusiasm and specificity
Make them feel truly seen and appreciated
tips: Be specific about what impressed you
Your enthusiasm is contagious and uplifting
